RNS Number : 4934EAVEVA Group PLC07 July 2021

AVEVA Group plc (the "Company")

2021 Annual General Meeting Results

At the Company's Annual General Meeting held at 9.00 a.m. today, Wednesday 7 July 2021, all of the resolutions put to the meeting were passed on a poll vote. The results are set out below.

The full text of all the resolutions can be found in the Notice of Annual General Meeting which is available for viewing at the National Storage Mechanism which can be located at https://data.fca.org.uk/#/nsm/nationalstoragemechanism and from the Company's website www.aveva.com .
